item.title: Permanent Portfolio
item.description: An all weather portfolio Based on the literature, permanent portfolio is an investment strategy that is able to yield moderate returns and relatively low volatility. Investor is recommended to invest equally (25%) into GLD, Index, Bond and Cash and rebalance it back to this proportion on regular intervals. This approach is something that I’m keen to adopt for a portion of my portfolio. To investigate the feasibility, I simulated a portfolio starting at $300 on Nov 2004.
